sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"google-play"}}>{`Google Play`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"virtual-devices"}}>{`Virtual Devices`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Genymotion is useful to grab a bunch of different emulators for Android and come with a personal use or paid license. `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The device version and Genymotion may need to be aligned, so to do so, create a new Virtual Device.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This can be easily done by selecting `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Create`}</MDXTag>{`, choosing a device and then naming it to something useable like `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`reactnative`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"testing-the-app-on-the-emulator"}}>{`Testing the app on the emulator`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To do so, first run the emulator. After the emulator is up and running, use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`react-native run-android`}</MDXTag>{` on the CLI to start the app. The CLI will respond if there are any errors.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"uploading-to-the-google-play-store"}}>{`Uploading to the Google Play Store`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"debugging"}}>{`Debugging`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`General Notes`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Running a build from the IDE will generally give better support for debugging issues and auto-updating code.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Some errors I've come across:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Error`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Resolution`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`error: could not install *smartsocket* listener: Address already in use`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Ensure socket not in use eg no `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`gulp watch`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Component Install error`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Update your install for `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`android/build.gradle`}</MDXTag>{` (look for buildToolsVersion) - Android Studio can automate this for you`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`Could not get BatchedBridge, make sure your nundle is packaged correctly`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`react-native start`}</MDXTag>{` from the CLI and reload app`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`UNMET PEER DEPENDENCY`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`rm -rf node-modules/ && npm cache clear && npm install`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`protected boolean getUseDeveloperSupport()`}</MDXTag>{` issue`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Change `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`protected`}</MDXTag>{` to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`public`}</MDXTag>{` (Java Error)`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`@providesModule naming collision`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`If caused by react-native-router-flux -> update or search Github`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Full cache reset`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache clean && npm install && npm start -- --reset-cache`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`react-native-router-flux issues`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This one was a bit tricky - some useful Github pages:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/aksonov/react-native-router-flux/issues/1803"}}>{`https://github.com/aksonov/react-native-router-flux/issues/1803`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/13390"}}>{`https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/13390`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/react-community/react-navigation/issues/923"}}>{`https://github.com/react-community/react-navigation/issues/923`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/aksonov/react-native-router-flux/issues/1816"}}>{`https://github.com/aksonov/react-native-router-flux/issues/1816`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`General React Native Commands`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`react-native upgrade`}</MDXTag>{` - upgrade the files being used `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`react-native-git-upgrade`}</MDXTag>{` - newer upgrade (needs to be install globally first)`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Issues with React/ build path in Xcode?`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/oblador/react-native-vector-icons/issues/373"}}>{`https://github.com/oblador/react-native-vector-icons/issues/373`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Other issues`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Ensure Cocoapods is up to date `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`sudo gem install cocoapods`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
